title: Bug 37021 - source path wrong in declare warning on binary files
description:
Bug 37021 - source path wrong in declare warning on binary files [java|aj] 

To replicate the issue, please follow these steps:
1. Navigate to tests/new/binaryWarnings/..
2. Run the code to observe the problem

Limitations of the tests: These tests may return false positives when detecting this error because filename checking is not enabled in harness verification of messages. In AJDT, if the filename makes no sense to AJDT, it may simply omit it.
OB: The source path in declare warning messages when targeting .class files from injars is listed in the form 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main.class'.
EB: The source path in declare warning messages when targeting .class files from injars should be listed in the form 'app/Main.class' instead of 'app.Main.class'.
SR:
1. Navigate to declare warning messages when targeting .class files from injars
2. Observe that the source path is listed in the form 'app.Main.class'
3. The source path should be listed in the form 'app/Main.class'
